messages.content: When will my AC be fixed?

I understand you need clarity on timing. I'm documenting your request right as quickly as possible prioritized and will as quickly as possible start the process. While I can't prioritize exact times, I'll track each step with you and update you as soon as I have information from the team.
But I need to know when

Let's monitor this together. I'll check in every 2 hours with updates, even if just to confirm we're still working on it. If there are delays, We'll work to explore backup options together. Your situation is documented as priority.

This is absolutely unacceptable and I'm deeply sorry you experienced this. Discrimination has no place here. I'm documenting this as a formal complaint and escalating as quickly as possible. You have the right to feel safe and respected in your home.
Will anything actually change?

Yes. This triggers our zero-tolerance policy. I'm connecting you with our Fair Housing officer as soon as possible. We'll work to investigate fully and take appropriate action. You also have the option to file with external agencies, which I can help you with.
